text: Dirty Dancing is a 1987 American romantic drama movie directed by Emile Ardolino. It is set in 1963 in the Catskill Mountains, New York. It stars Jennifer Grey as a 17 year old on vacation and Patrick Swayze as the resort's dance instructor. The movie did very well at the box office and it became a cult classic. A remake was released in 2017. == Other websites == * Category:1980s coming-of-age movies Category:1987 romantic drama movies Category:1980s teen drama movies Category:1980s teen romance movies Category:American coming-of-age movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:American teen romance movies Category:Coming-of-age drama movies Category:Coming-of-age romance movies Category:Dance movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies about vacationing Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies that won the Best Original Song Academy Award Category:American independent movies Category:Lionsgate movies Category:Movies directed by Emile Ardolino Category:Cult movies
title: Dirty Dancing
